transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji namaskar sir.
Customer: Namaskar ji.
Executive: Mai Abhishek baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. ARBL objective company se baat, right?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ji actually sir aapki or se ek call receive hui thi meet ke regarding to usme abhi meri baat hui hai 705 wale aapke number se.
Customer: Sir sir koi insan, kisse baat hui thi?
Executive: Mandeep ji se number unka hai 80591.
Customer: Nahi ye to mere father sahab ka number hai.
Executive: Ji 91 piche 705 father sahab ka number hai aapke?
Customer: Haan. Okay. To actually kya hai na unse abhi baat hui thi leads vagera maine socha aapko mai khud bhej raha hu apni taraf se personally. Thik hai na? Taki aapko galat leads ka chances na rahe.
Executive: Thik hai na unke whatsapp pe bhi bheji hui hai.
Customer: Hai aapko bhi chahiye to bhej dunga. Phone use kar rahe the.
Customer: Nahi aap ye wala jo mera number hai na ye mai use karta hu.
Executive: Aap ispe bhej du? Haan. Aapke aapke lead pe bhej du. Thik hai mai aapke me bhej deta hu aapke me bhi abhi bhi ek lead aayi to bhej deta hu.
Customer: Abhi aayi ki by leads thi ya kaise kya?
Executive: Maine abhi dekho jo aapka by lead ka concern aaya to maine by lead aapke search kiya to ek by lead mujhe dikha jo aapke relevant concern hoga. Relevant hai to maine aapko bhej diya sir ko. Vahi 705 wale number se. Abhi maine aapke me bhi vahi bhej deta hu. Kyuki jab aapke jab call aayi thi na to vo usi concern raise hua tha to usko close karna tha.
Executive: Thik hai isiliye maine confirm kiya abhi meri baat ho gayi sir se.
Customer: Achha achha vo kaha ki thi call abhi baat ho gayi hai mere father sahab se?
Executive: Haan, haan ji abhi baat ho gayi hai aapki meri.
Customer: Nahi nahi vo customer ki baat ho gayi?
Executive: Nahi customer ki jab aap call lagayenge tab hogi baat.
Customer: Nahi lead lead search karke aapke whatsapp pe bhej di hai taki aap usko click karke apne link ko connect kar sako.
Executive: Aur jaise hi koi lead aati hai ab mai khud aapko send karunga. Aap bhi dekhte rahiye ga mai bhi send karunga.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To aise kya hai double double kam rahega. Thik hai na sir? Abhi isko mai close kar raha hu sir iska feedback aayega aapke paas. Ispe yes kar dijiyega sir. Okay?
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai sir.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about the buyleads.

- Customer wants buyleads on his number.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed about the buyleads.

- Executive sent the buyleads on customer's number.

- Executive confirmed about the feedback.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, whatsapp
